  ┃
  ┃  △ Permission required
  ┃
  ┃  # Check end of extraInit file
  ┃
  ┃  $ cat ~/.config/tmux/extraInit | tail -20
  ┃
  ┃   Allow once   Allow always   Reject                               ⇆ select  enter confirm
  ┃
  ┃  Plan  Claude Sonnet 4.5 (latest) Anthropic                                                                      ~/.config/dotfiles:HEAD
  ╹▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀
                                                                                tab switch agent  ctrl+p commands    • OpenCode 1.1.3
